entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , La Scie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Scie 11:30 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -6.6°C
Wind: NNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or freezing rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Snow changing through ice pellets and freezing rain to rain in the afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 near noon. High 7. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Showers. Windy. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022
